wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Scott (born 4 December 1926) is an author of thriller fiction, mostly published during the 1980s.  His subject periods run from the theatres of the Second World War to post war Europe.  A number of his novels feature seagoing prominently and he sometimes get categorised as an author of naval fiction.

response: * Douglas Scott (born 1926), writer of thrillers often based during the Second World War
* Douglas Scott (designer) (1913–1990), designer of the London Routemaster double-decker bus
* George Douglas Scott or Doug Scott, chairman of TEDCO
